column11: Creepy place! According to the descriptions of 73 gems and jewelry stores, in fact there are 5 stalls with some kind of garbage. Don't waste your time

The Gold Center is located in the old building where St. Johns Fiskmarket was located. This is the only gold center in Colombo and all the jewelry shops are located on the ground floor. Apparently there are over 80 stalls, but don't make the same mistake as me and visit on a Sunday as it will be closed.
